ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Druids and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t really understand your question but for the most part druids don t wear Plate armor but there is some other armor out there that they can wear that is
ygData.messageBody:
Don't really understand your question but for the most part druids don't
wear Plate armor but there is some other armor out there that they can wear
that is "metal", i.e. their planar pieces, SoV quest armors and some other
armors as well.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: MLockridge01@... [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 10:24 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Druids and armor


I heard somewhere that Druids cannot use metal armor. Does this
restriction reflect in the class/race stats on items, or can a druid
equip something that will be somehow detrimental?

Barto of Rivervale.
